page.title: 06THE MEDIA
page.content: Favourite t.v.programme 100 children were asked what their favourite t.v. programme was. The top choices were as follows:40% cartoons;7% Number 73. We think cartoons were the most popular because they are short, bright and lively. Favourite type of story 100 children were asked what their favourite type of book was. The results were as follows:32% adventure stories;22% fairy tales;12% science fiction. The most popular author was Enid Blyton. Most popular comic Our survey showed us that the most popular comics were Tom and Jerry, Bugs Bunny and Beano. They each gained 15% of the votes.
